target_social_need: Access to healthcare and primary care (include improved coverage, services, and timeliness)
study_type: Any social need that arises in population addressed
specific_intervention_components: Active assistance with resources (vouchers, appt scheduling, enrollment form help)
health_outcomes: Changes in functional outcomes (e.g., blood pressure)

study_type: More than one clearly defined social topic addressed
study_design: Comparative effectiveness within arm pre-post outcome trend
race_ethnicity_majority: No single group is a majority

specific_intervention_components: Patient education (including on health, other social need, or resources)

comparator: Usual Care or Active comparator that also addresses social needs
service_provider: Other non-professionals, including volunteers and study staff

recruitment_setting: Primary care (family health centers, community health centers, family medicine, pediatric or VA clinics,)
intervention_setting: Primary care (family health centers, community health centers, family medicine, pediatric or VA clinics)
